name: tags(in:unit:scheme:options:)
desc: Finds an array of linguistic tags and token ranges for a given string range and linguistic unit.
declaration:
@nonobjc func tags(in range: Range<String.Index>, 
              unit: NLTokenUnit, 
            scheme: NLTagScheme, 
           options: NLTagger.Options = []) -> [(NLTag?, Range<String.Index>)]
